data.scheme_name: Madhya Pradesh MSME Development Policy 2021-Pharmaceutical Sector-Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides 50% assistance up to a maximum of 25 Lakhs, to support the establishment of laboratory equipment and machinery.
data.eligibility: MSMEs engaged in manufacturing sector requires assistance for  apparels  for diversification & expansion are eligible under this scheme
data.conditions:
1. The cost of building shall not be more than 200% of the cost of Plant and machinery for the purpose of calculating the Industrial Development Subsidy. 
  2. Manufacturing MSMEs which have started commercial production on or after 01.07.2020 but before the date of notification of this Policy, will be eligible to receive assistance under the earlier relevant policies. It is clarified that such units will not be eligible for assistance/facilitation under this Policy.
data.beneficiaries: Sectors which are engaged in Pharmaceutical Sector with an Investment of Upto Rs.10 crores in Plant and Machinery.
data.prerequisites:
1. The cost of building shall not be more than 200% of the cost of Plant and machinery for the purpose of calculating the Industrial Development Subsidy. 
  2. Manufacturing MSMEs which have started commercial production on or after 01.07.2020 but before the date of notification of this Policy, will be eligible to receive assistance under the earlier relevant policies. 
  3. It is clarified that such units will not be eligible for assistance/facilitation under this Policy.
data.nodal_agency: Department of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises
data.context: Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME) sector is considered engine for socio economic growth in the country and is fast emerging as the most vibrant and dynamic sector of the Indian economy. MSMEs provide the largest share of employment after primary sector. We are aware that, employment generation is one of the main challenges faced in the country today. This makes development of MSME sector most crucial. The Government of Madhya Pradesh (GoMP) recognizes this aspect and accordingly, is giving priority to the development of the MSME sector in the state.
data.objective:
1. Achieving the stateâ€™s goal of overall industrial development and MSME competitiveness. 
  2. Creating enabling infrastructure.
  3. Providing a conducive ecosystem and promoting inclusive growth for MSMEs. 
  4. Providing an opportunity to young entrepreneurs through instilling employment generation.
data.description: Scheme provides 50% assistance up to a maximum of 25 Lakhs, to support the establishment of laboratory equipment and machinery.
data.how_to_apply:
Industry can Register themselves on the Common portal to avail various services:
https://invest.mp.gov.in/CM/registration
data.funding_facilitator: Madhya Pradesh Industrial Development Co. Ltd., Industries Commissioner, M.P
data.funding_mechanism: Amount will be disbursed to the applicants account after approval of  the Application.
data.additional_info:
1. The unit availing the benefits of this special package will be able to avail other remaining facilities (which are not of the similar type) declared under this policy as per eligibility. 
  2. For new manufacturing units, which will start production on or after the date of notification of this Policy, the option of availing facilities/assistances under the earlier incentive schemes will not be available. 
  3. However, the existing MSMEs in the manufacturing sector undertaking expansion/diversification/technological upgradation during the effective period of this Policy will be eligible for assistance/facilities equivalent to a new industrial unit on the additional eligible investment made by them, if the unit remains in the eligible MSME category after such investment.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Copy of Udyam Registration Certificate 
2. Self-Certified Copy of Partnership Deed / Memorandum and Articles of Association (as applicable) 
3. Self-Certified Copy of land purchase deed (if land is owned by applicant) 
4. PAN Card
5. Detailed Project Report
6. Memorandum of Article (MOA)
7. Balance sheet for Annual Turnover
8. Udyam Registration Certificate
9. Caste certificate(If Applicable)
10. Copy of the invoices, cash bills and stamped receipt duly attested
data.checklist_info_d:
